constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 47 (Friday, March 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. YARMUTH:
H.R. 1868.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 1 and Article I, Section 8,
clause 18 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1364]
title: To prevent across-the-board direct spending cuts, and for other purposes.
